TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SelectionRange extends System.Object

Docs.summary: 表示在月曆控制項中的資料選取範圍。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>是日期或日期選取和上反白顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制項。 如果只選取一個日期，則<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>屬性值將會相等。 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>可以變更使用者按一下時所要的日期中, 拖曳滑鼠指標的日期，或您可以在程式碼中設定範圍。 比方說，您可能想要讓使用者輸入的日期範圍分成兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項或兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>控制項和集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>根據這些日期。
## Examples 下列範例會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制項根據分成兩個輸入的兩個日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制於何時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>按下。 此程式碼假設的新執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>上已建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。 您可以考慮新增程式碼以驗證<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>指派給文字方塊中，以確認其包含有效的日期。
[!code-cpp[Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>值都會設為`null`使用這個建構函式時。
## Examples 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>物件，會將其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>屬性，並指派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制項。 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>引發事件時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>屬性值會顯示在文字方塊中。 這個範例假設您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>具有兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制項。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members/CPP/selectionrangeobj.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members/CS/selectionrangeobj.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members/VB/selectionrangeobj.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange range) cil managed

Docs.summary: 使用指定的選取範圍來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>屬性值會指派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>屬性值的指派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>物件。
## Examples 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>物件，會將其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>屬性，並指派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.SelectionRange%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制項。 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>引發事件時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>屬性值會顯示在文字方塊中。 這個範例假設您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>具有兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制項。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members/CPP/selectionrangeobj.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members/CS/selectionrangeobj.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange Members/VB/selectionrangeobj.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.DateTime lower, valuetype System.DateTime upper) cil managed
Public Sub New (lower As DateTime, upper As DateTime)

Docs.summary: 使用指定的開始和結束日期來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > 如果`lower`<xref:System.DateTime>值大於`upper`<xref:System.DateTime>值`lower`值會指派給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A>屬性而非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A>屬性。
## Examples 下列範例會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制項根據分成兩個輸入的兩個日期<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制於何時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>按下。 此程式碼假設的新執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>控制兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>上已建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。 您可以考慮新增程式碼以驗證<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>指派給文字方塊中，以確認其包含有效的日期。
[!code-cpp[Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic SelectionRange.SelectionRange1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
